Description: This floor length gown with slight train is perfect for an evening out. It's sultry, plunging neckline turns this gown into a night to remember. There are nude peek-a-boo cut outs on the sides and the back has a nude sheer look. Intricate beading adds flare and design to this beautiful gown.
